content:
From: Jens Doll <jd@cococo.de>
Thank you Tobias for the theory file about the Gauss-Seidel algorithm.
I'll try to build on this result in my project. My aim is to have an
automatically transformed PL(1) formula from the algorithm, although I
do not know when and how the goal can be reached.

Regards,
Jens Doll
